name: web-eye-tracking-recorder
description: Web Eye Tracking Recorder - Browser-based screen recording and eye tracking library

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --format esm && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./dist
scripts.build:react: bun build ./src/react/index.ts --outdir ./dist/react --target browser --format esm && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir ./dist/react ./src/react/index.ts
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:react
scripts.build:examples: bun run build && cp dist/index.js examples/web-eye-tracking-recorder.js

author: shikibu9419
